review.title: TERRIBLE !!!!!!!!!
review.reviewText: Very noisy, the beds are extremely hard, and the costumer service was very rude and unprofessional!!!! The only reason why I opted to stay was because it was for one night and the hotel was clean. Definitely not worth the money.

review.title: Excellent service from staff and good quality room
review.reviewText: The rooms are quite good for the price but the best thing about this hotel is the extremely friendly and helpful staff from the front desk to the bell boy. I arrived in a taxi without money to pay for it expecting the hotel to direct me to an ATM nearby. As there was none open in the area at that time of night, the staff at the front desk lent me money to cover the cab until I could get to an ATM later that evening. The staff was also extremely helpful in providing info, arranging for taxis and even helped me order delivery food as the hotel restaurant was closed at the time i wanted to eat.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff were always happy to provide info, call a cab or even assist with ordering delivery food.
review.negativeRemarks: Restaurant hours are pretty limited. I arrived before 9pm and the restaurant was already closed. The following night it closed before 7pm.
review.locationRemarks: Close to Gold Museam and Trans Millenio rapid transit station is right in front of the hotel.

review.title: No maintenance or poor management !
review.reviewText: I got at the hotel almost 2 :00 PM, at the room I had no papers saying what numbers to call if you want to talk to the front desk or make calls, the shower had no hot water, just after 4:00 PM I had it, I could not close the bathroom door, (door didn't fit the frame well), cant flush the toilette, (little water, slow flush and takes a long time to fill again), lights at the room was terrible, just a couple choices at the hotel restaurant and a poor breakfast. Day after I left and went to other place.

review.title: Layover...
review.reviewText: I had to stay in bogota for 1 night layover to conect next day to my final destination so i was looking for a cheap hotel to stay, so for the price i think it was ok, but i dont recomended for a long stay in bogota, cause its in the center but located in a bad area... no air conditioning, even if the wather was ok, i think its kind of weird a hotel without it... but everything else, bed, room, bath was ok so inst big deal for 1 night.

review.title: Not impressed
review.reviewText: The standard must at least be close to described on internet
